articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Manny (🧱,🚀)
Remixing this.
I went from working at a large agency working with big name clients, to working on crypto projects, to joining @developer_dao, started helping people more and more, and then ultimately jumped into devrel and I loved it. Not easy but rewarding. 7+ months in devrel
rahat.eth: Just reflecting on the last few years - 
I went from Frontend Engineering to founding failed startups - back to frontend engineering this time in web3. Then ultimately jumped into devrel and I've loved it. Been almost 9 months here.
